parameter.name: name
parameter.description: Unique name the connection is identified by

parameter.name: connectionType
parameter.description: Protocol to communicate with file system. Possible values 'LOCAL', 'FTP', 'FTPS', 'SFTP'

parameter.name: workingDir
parameter.description: Working directory. File paths in operations should be given w.r.t this folder

parameter.name: fileLockScheme
parameter.description: File locking behaviour to use. Local or Cluster

parameter.name: maxFailureRetryCount
parameter.description: Max retry count upon file operation failure

parameter.name: host
parameter.description: Host name of the file server

parameter.name: port
parameter.description: The port number of the file server

parameter.name: username
parameter.description: Username used to connect with the file server

parameter.name: password
parameter.description: Password to connect with the file server

parameter.name: userDirIsRoot
parameter.description: Whether to treat the user directory as the root directory

parameter.name: isPassive
parameter.description: True if to enter into passive mode

parameter.name: ftpConnectionTimeout
parameter.description: Timeout in milisec for initial control connection

parameter.name: ftpSocketTimeout
parameter.description: Socket timeout for FTP client

parameter.name: keyStorePath
parameter.description: Path to keyStore

parameter.name: keyStorePassword
parameter.description: KeyStore password

parameter.name: trustStorePath
parameter.description: Path to trustStore

parameter.name: trustStorePassword
parameter.description: TrustStore password

parameter.name: implicitModeEnabled
parameter.description: True if implicit mode is enabled (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/FTPS#Implicit)

parameter.name: channelProtectionLevel
parameter.description: FTP Data Channel protection level

parameter.name: sftpConnectionTimeout
parameter.description: Jsch connection timeout in milliSec

parameter.name: sftpSessionTimeout
parameter.description: Jsch session timeout in millisec

parameter.name: strictHostKeyChecking
parameter.description: Host key checking to use. If true it will use 'yes'

parameter.name: privateKeyFilePath
parameter.description: path to private key file

parameter.name: privateKeyPassword
parameter.description: Passphrase of the private key

parameter.name: setAvoidPermission
parameter.description: Sets whether to avoid file permission check.

parameter.name: sftpPoolConnectionAgedTimeout
parameter.description: Interval to close connections in the connection pool in seconds
